DEFAULT.question: How do I get the fixed deposit advice/proof?
DEFAULT.answer: Fixed deposit advice/proof will be sent to your registered email address within 1 working day of issuance of your fixed deposit.

Payment.question: Why did my fixed deposit investment fail?
Payment.answer:
Your fixed deposit investment may fail due to:

-incorrect/mismatched data in the KYC documents submitted resulting in KYC rejection
-payment issues while booking the fixed deposit

Please re-upload your documents or retry making the payment.

If this is a recurring issue, please raise a ticket. We'll resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Payment.question: Why can't I use Groww Balance for FDs?
Payment.answer:
Due to banking regulations, money in your Groww Balance cannot be used for FDs. 

All FD transactions have to be between your bank account (added on Groww) and the FD issuing bank directly.

Payment.question: How do I track my FD transaction?
Payment.answer:
Press the 'MY ORDERS' button below to see your FD transactions. 

Note: If the amount has been deducted from your account but is not reflecting, then it will be refunded back to your account in 2-3 working days.

Payment.question: Where will my fixed deposit amount get credited after maturity?
Payment.answer: Once matured, your fixed deposit amount will be credited to the same bank account you used for payment.

Refund.question: My fixed deposit order failed. When will I get the refund?
Refund.answer: You will receive the refund amount in your bank account within 5-7 working days.

Bajaj Finance.question: How will I receive Bajaj Finance - Fixed Deposit Receipt?
Bajaj Finance.answer: Bajaj Finance will courier Fixed Deposit Receipt (FDR) certificate to your registered address within 3 weeks of opening the FD.

Bajaj Finance.question: How to change my bank account details for Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance.answer: Download the 'change of bank details form' by pressing the 'DOWNLOAD FORM' button below and submit it at your nearest branch. The list of branches is available on Bajaj Finance website.

Bajaj Finance.question: Are there any benefits of renewing Bajaj Finance FD?
Bajaj Finance.answer: Yes. An additional rate of 0.10% p.a. (for deposit size up to â‚¹5 Crore) is applicable on renewal.

Bajaj Finance.question: What happens to my FD if I go abroad and become an NRI?
Bajaj Finance.answer:
In such a case, you have to inform Bajaj Finance Ltd by writing an email to fd@bajajfinserv.in, and submitting relevant documents. 

From the date of receipt of such documents, they will change the status of the deposit as NRI and taxation guidelines will apply accordingly.

Bajaj Finance.question: I have lost my FD certificate/Receipt for Bajaj Finance FD. How to get a new FD certificate?
Bajaj Finance.answer: Please submit a written request duly signed by all the FD account holders at your nearest branch. The list of branches is available on Bajaj Finance website.

Bajaj Finance.question: My issue is not listed here.
Bajaj Finance.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
